thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Nice staff members willing to work with you for a deal. Doug was funny and treated me kindly. They were a little bit slow, many others in the waiting area reported waiting for 2+ hours for their car to be completed. I do wish there were different reading materials in the waiting area! Over all a good experience.
